txt.en:
'You have our trust, [placeholder]. In return, I would ask that you ply your blade on our behalf once again.

'To the north are the barren slopes of Fanuidhol where Orcs and goblins have crept out of the cracks that run deep into the bowels of Moria. 

'Our scouts watch them from the telain that border the forest there and contrive their downfall. It is fair enough sport, but only a prelude of the battles to come should our true hopes fail us.'

'Welcome to Talan Fanuidhol, [placeholder]. The Fanuidhol watch is an onerous duty, but it provides ample target practice...and with a bit of creativity, it can be a fair way to pass the time.\n\n'Do not be fooled, though. Beyond this border, the Enemy is gathering to destroy us. They await the day when their Dark Lord emerges from Barad-dûr to lead them into Caras Galadhon, to the doom of us all.'
You have been acknowledged as a friend of Lothlórien through your efforts on behalf of the Elves.

'You have our trust, [placeholder]. In return, I would ask that you ply your blade on our behalf once again.

'To the north are the barren slopes of Fanuidhol where Orcs and goblins have crept out of the cracks that run deep into the bowels of Moria. 

'Our scouts watch them from the telain that border the forest there and contrive their downfall. It is fair enough sport, but only a prelude of the battles to come should our true hopes fail us.'
Talk to Bahanneth at Talan Fanuidhol

Bahanneth is at Talan Fanuidhol to the north.\n\nYou have been instructed to speak with Bahanneth, who will tell you how best you might aid the defenders there in thwarting the Orcs that foray out of Moria.
